p: High population density has also been associated with the spread of epidemics, including COVID-19 [ 194]. In the case of COVID-19, a high number of cases have been observed in overcrowded cities in countries such as China, Japan, India, and the United States. Additionally, countries with a high proportion of elderly populations, such as Italy and Spain, have a higher risk of severity [ 181], and this risk increases when young and older people live together [ 195].
